annotations.description: This is the most complicated cocktail I've ever made- and until 2006 it was nearly completely lost. ********************************** The Pearl Diver is a c...
annotations.title: Pearl Diver | How to Drink

textContent:
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. Lime Juice
1 oz. -or-30 ml. orange juice
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. gardenia mix (https://www.liquor.com/recipes/dons-gardenia-mix/#gs.kw1t0n)
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. demerara rum
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. puerto rican rum
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Jamaican rum
Two bar spoons of Falernum

Shake & open pour
garnish with palm fronds and orchids

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e5P8KetaRVY
title: Pearl Diver
